poem.title: Sair Appallin
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
In Greece if you want to walk the walk
You got to smoke the smoke. St George
Was ok, but our real patron saint is Saint Pall.
Now you gringos you think you're so
Clever. You are. But remember: you got
To within six per cent and one dicky heartbeat
Of That.
